Html:
Hi, Radioman!

Thanks for your cool gmap.net =)
On windows i'm successfully using gmap.net, but when i started porting my app to linux, i had some troubles...

I'v got this message: "Could not load file or assembly 'Mono.Data.SqliteClient, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=0738eb9f132ed756' or one of its dependencies.", while trying run mono version form GMap.NET.WindowsForms.Mono.tar archive.

Where i can find Mono.Data.SqliteClient? System.Data.SQLite.dll doesn't working :(

OS is Ubuntu 15.04.

Yes, libmono-winforms2.0-cil is checked and installed (installed mono complete).
I'm running mono version of Gmap.Net Demo, compiled by you, form GMap.NET.WindowsForms.Mono.tar archive from this site.
Also installed libmono-sqlite2.0-cil & libmono-sqlite4.0-cil
i've updated mono libs, it's fine now, build the latest version
Thanks, i will try and report result!
Now all working fine! But map type can not be changed (can't even open dropdown list).
